Event.Name: GhatakaMoonSign
Event.ConditionDescription: If the ghataka element happens to be Moon
Event.Description: injury is on reputation,

Event.Name: GhatakaTithiGroup
Event.ConditionDescription: If the ghataka element happens to be Tithi or Nakshatra
Event.Description: the injury is more mental and emotional.

Event.Name: GhatakaWeekDay
Event.ConditionDescription: If the ghataka element happens to be Weekday or the Lagna,
Event.Description: the injury is more physical

Event.Name: GhatakaMoonConstellation
Event.ConditionDescription: If the ghataka element happens to be Tithi or Nakshatra,
Event.Description: the injury is more mental and emotional.

Event.Name: GhatakaLagna
Event.ConditionDescription: If the ghataka element happens to be Weekday or the Lagna,
Event.Description: the injury is more physical

Event.Name: BirdRuling
Event.Description: Bird is at its highest activity of strength. Ruling, all his endeavours are crowned with success, he wins over others. He succeeds in interviews, he wins over the heart of his fiancé, he succeeds in any work which he starts during this time, his illness is cured if treatment is started during this time. At this stage; a girl attaining puberty (appearance of first period), lives in a highest standard of life happily throughout. Apart from the above this can be applied in the same way such as starting for a travel, going to see the higher-ups, performing marriage, starting education for the first time in life (putting to school first), accepting a new job, joining a new job, taking a new assignment or taking oath of allegiance for the post of Ministers, Head ofthe Departments etc. When once started, during the strongest ebb of vibrations or activities all these endeavours get succeeded

Event.Name: BirdEating
Event.Description: The eating activity gets defeated by Ruling activity but wins over the remaining three viz.. Walking, Sleeping and Dying

Event.Name: BirdWalking
Event.Description: The Walking activity gets defeated by Ruling and Eating activity but wins over the other two activities viz.. Sleeping and Dying.

Event.Name: GoodLunarDayForTravel
Event.Description: For journeys/travel the best lunar days are the 2nd, 3rd, 5th, 7th, 10th, 11th and 13th.

Event.Name: BadLunarDayForTravel
Event.Description: For journeys/travel the 14th lunar day and Full and New Moon days should be avoided at any cost.

Event.Name: GoodConstellationForTravel
Event.Description: If a journey is undertaken in the following constellations, the person is supposed to return back early after satisfactorily completing his work: Mrigasira, Aswini, Pushya, Punarvasu, Hasta, Anuradha, Sravana, Moola, Dhanishta and Revati. It is better that the journey is commenced in the 2nd, 3rd or last quarter of the constellation. The first quarter may be avoided as far as possible.

Event.Name: BadConstellationForTravel
Event.Description: No journey should be undertaken on days ruled by Krithika, Bharani. Aslesha. Visakha, Pubba, Poorvabhadra and Aridra. Of these, the following nakshatras may be deemed fit for travelling beyond the spheres of evil influence: - Krittika - 13 ghatis; Bharani - 7; Makha - 14; Pubba, Poorvashadha and Poorvabhadra - 16; Swati, Aslesha and Visakha - 14. In our humble experience, it is found that Bharani and Krithika should always be avoided while the other stars given in this paragraph, journeys can be undertaken in. We have to emphasize that Bharani and Krithika should be invariably rejected.

Event.Name: BadWeekdayForTravelEast
Event.Description: Do not travel towards the East on Saturday and Monday Provided the journey is timed to begin beyond 8 ghatis on Saturday and Monday, the above restriction does not hold good.

Event.Name: BadWeekdayForTravelSouth
Event.Description: Do not travel towards South on Thursday. Provided the journey is timed to begin beyond 22 ghatis on Thursday, the above restriction does not hold good.

Event.Name: BadWeekdayForTravelWest
Event.Description: Do not travel towards West on Sunday and Friday. Provided the journey is timed to begin beyond 15 ghatis on Friday and Sunday, the above restriction does not hold good.

Event.Name: BadWeekdayForTravelNorth
Event.Description:
Do not travel towards North on Wednesday and Tuesday. Provided the journey is timed to begin beyond 12 ghatis on Tuesday and Wednesday, the above restriction does not hold good
In our view, Tuesday must preferably be avoided.

Event.Name: GoodLagnaForTravel
Event.Description: Aries, Taurus, Cancer, Leo, Libra and Sagittarius are favorable signs for starting on a journey.

Event.Name: BestLagnaForTravel
Event.Description: Rising sign at the time of journey being one's Janma Rasi is highly favoured.

Event.Name: WorstLagnaForTravel
Event.Description: Rising sign at the time of journey should never be the sign of one's Janma Lagna.

Event.Name: BadLagnaForTravel
Event.Description: Journey should not also be undertaken when the Lagna is the 5th, 7th or the 9th from one's Janma Lagna.

Event.Name: GoodPlanetsInLagnaForTravel
Event.Description: Let Jupiter or Venus be well placed in Lagna at the time of starting. This makes the journey successful.

Event.Name: GoodMoonJupiterTravelYoga
Event.Description: The Moon should be in the 3rd, 6th, 9th or 12th and Jupiter in a kendra from Lagna.

Event.Name: FortifiedMoonTravelYoga
Event.Description: Start when the Moon is in Lagna fortified by the disposition of Jupiter or Venus in a kendra.

Event.Name: StrongJupiterTravelYoga
Event.Description: Jupiter strong in Lagna and the Moon in any place other than the 8th would be a strong combination.

Event.Name: EasyPeacefulTravelYoga
Event.Description: The journey will be easy and peaceful if the Moon be in the 7th and Venus and Mercury be in the 4th.

Event.Name: NeutralizeBadTravelYoga
Event.Description: Mercury in the 4th, Jupiter in the 2nd or 7th will neutralize all the other adverse influences.

Event.Name: StrongBeneficsTravelYoga
Event.Description: Benefics dignified in kendras or trikonas act as powerful antidotes for all evils.

Event.Name: IdealPlanetsTravelYoga
Event.Description: Jupiter in Lagna, malefics in Upachayas and Venus in any house other than the 7th would be an ideal combinations.

Event.Name: AmritaSiddhaYoga
Event.Description: Sunday to Saturday respectively coinciding with the constellations Hasta, Sravana, Aswini, Anuradha, Pushya, Revati and Rohini will give rise to Amita Siddha Yoga.

Event.Name: PanchangaSuddhi
Event.Description: Panchanga Suddhi. - We have already said that a Panchanga consists of tithi, vara, nakshatra. yoga and karana. All these must be auspicious. In regard to lunar days, the 4th, 6th, 8th, 12th and 14th, full and new moon days should be avoided. In regard to vara, Thursday and Friday are held to be suitable for all works. Tuesday, is to be generally avoided except when it happens to be the 10th, 12th or 16th day of the child's birth when the child's Namakarana (baptising or giving name) may be performed. Of the several Nakshatras, Bharani and Krittika should be avoided for all auspicious works as these two are said to be presided o ver by the god of death (Yama) and the god of fire (Agni) respectively. In urgent cases if the Lagna could be fortified, the dosha due to nakshatra may get neutralised. The last parts of Aslesha, Jyeshta and Revati should also be avoided. Coming to the Yoga (vide page 12) the 6th (Atiganda). 9th (Soola). 10th (Ganda), 17th (Vyatipata) and 27th (Vydhruti) have deleterious effects upon events which are started or commenced under them. - The Karana chosen must be appropriate to the election in view. Thus Bava is auspicious for starting works of permanent importance while Thaithula is propitious for marriage. Bhadra is unfit for any good work but is eminently suitable for violent and cruel deeds. For getting initiation into kshudra mantras Sakuni Havana is propitious. Therefore, Panchanga Suddhi means a good lunar day, a beneficial weekday, an auspicious constellation, a good yoga and a fertilising Karana.

Event.Name: UgraYoga
Event.Description: Any treatment commenced under Ugra yogas are supposed to prove successful. Ugra yogas arise when the 3rd (or 9th), 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 9th, 10th, 12th (or 3rd) and 13th lunar days coincide respectively with Rohini, Uttara, Sravana, Mrigasira. Revats, Krittika, Pushva, Anuradha. Krittika (or Makha).

Event.Name: SuryaSankramana
Event.Description: The 2nd great evil is Surya Sankramana or the solar ingress into different zodiacal signs. When the Sun is about to leave one sign and enter another there seem to occur certain disturbances in the organisation of the solar forces and such times are not recommended for any good work. On the contrary, they are held to be propitious for meditation, initiation into secret mantras and performance of certain religious rites which are held to purify not only the bodily electrical discharges but also the mental currents. Sixteen ghatis (6 hours 24 minutes) both before and after the entry of the Sun into a new sign should be rejected for all new works.

Event.Name: KarthariDosha
Event.Description: Karthari means scissors. In an election, when two evil planets are placed on either side of the Lagna, the combination goes under the special name of Karthari Dosha and it should be rejected for good work particularly in regard to marriage.

Event.Name: ShashtashtaRiphagathaChandraDosha
Event.Description: Shashtashta Riphagatha Chandra Dosha. - The Moon should invariably be avoided in the 6th, 8th and 12th houses from the Lagna rising in an election chart.

Event.Name: SagrahaChandraDosha
Event.Description: Sagraha Chandra Dosha. - The Moon's association (conjunction) with any other planet, benefic or malefic, should be avoided. This injunction is specially applicable in case of marriage.

Event.Name: UdayasthaSuddhi
Event.Description: Udayasta Suddhi. - The Lagna and the seventh should be strong. The Lagna should be occupied by its own lord and the Navamsa Lagna by its own lord or vice versa or lord of Lagna should aspect Navamsa Lagna and vice versa. Similarly the seventh and the lord of the seventh Bhava should be favourably disposed. The strength of Lagna and the seventh is necessary in all elections but especially so in regard to marriage.

Event.Name: SiddhaYoga
Event.Description: When a certain weekday coincides with a certain asterism and a certain lunar day, it becomes specialy auspicious for good work.

Event.Name: SakunaKarana
Event.Description: For getting initiations into mantras Sakini Karana is propitious

Event.Name: BadNithyaYoga
Event.Description: Coming to the Yoga the 6th (Atiganda). 9th (Soola). 10th (Ganda), 17th (Vyatipata) and 27th (Vydhruti) have deleterious effects upon events which are started or commenced under them.

Event.Name: LagnaThyajya
Event.Description: Even when the ascendant is strong, certain parts of it which go under the name of Lagna tyajya should be rejected. In Aries, Taurus, Sagittarius and Virgo, the first three degrees should be avoided as it is supposed to be in the nature of a serpent (bhujanga) and hence destructive. In regard to Pisces, Capricorn, Cancer and Scorpio, the last (three degrees) has to be avoided as it is supposed to be presided over by the evil force of Rahu. The middle half ghati (13° 30' to 16° 30') should be rejected with regard to Gemini, Libra, Leo and Aquarius as it is ruled by an evil force termed Gridhra.

Event.Name: GoodPanchaka
Event.Description:
Panchaka (Five-Source Energy):
For matters of ordinary importance such as interviewing superiors or going on short journeys, a favourable Tarabala will do and there is no need to consider the panchaka. But in regard to very important ceremonies such as marriage, nuptials, entry into new houses, etc., this should be carefully looked into.
Five sources of planetary, stellar and zodiacal energies are involved. Take the number of the lunar day (from the 1st of the month), the number of the weekday, Sunday 1. etc.), the number of the constellation (from Aswini) and the number of the Lagna (from Aries). Add these together and divide the total by 9.

Event.Name: BadPanchaka
Event.Description:
Panchaka (Five-Source Energy):
For matters of ordinary importance such as interviewing superiors or going on short journeys, a favourable Tarabala will do and there is no need to consider the panchaka. But in regard to very important ceremonies such as marriage, nuptials, entry into new houses, etc., this should be carefully looked into.
Five sources of planetary, stellar and zodiacal energies are involved. Take the number of the lunar day (from the 1st of the month), the number of the weekday, Sunday 1. etc.), the number of the constellation (from Aswini) and the number of the Lagna (from Aries). Add these together and divide the total by 9.

Event.Name: BhriguShatka
Event.Description: The position of Venus in the 6th is injurious. This is especially so in regard to marriage. Even when Venus is exalted and associated with benefics, such a disposition is not approved.

Event.Name: Kujasthama
Event.Description: Mars should be avoided in the 8th house, as it indicates destruction of the object in view. In a marriage election chart. Mars in the 8th is unthinkable. Even if Mars is otherwise powerful, he should not occupy the 8th house.

Event.Name: GoodHairCutting
Event.Description: Shaving may be had in the constellations of Pushya, Punarvasu, Rcvati, Hasta, Sravana, Dhanista, Mrignsira, Aswini, Chitta, Jyeshta, Satabliislia and Swati. 4th, Gth and 14th lunar days as also New Moon and Full Moon days arc not desirable. And solar and lunar eclipses.

Event.Name: GoodNailCutting
Event.Description: Avoid Fridays and Saturdays - the 8th, 9th, 14th lunar days as well as New and Full Moon days.

Event.Name: FixedConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Rohini, Uttara, Uttarashadha and Uttarabhadra are supposed to be fixed constellations and they are favourable for coronations, laying the foundations of cities, sowing operations, planting trees and other permanent things.

Event.Name: SoftConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Chitta, Anuradha, Mrigasira and Revati are soft constellations. They are good for wearing new apparel, learning dancing, music and fine arts, sexual union and performance of auspicious ceremonies.

Event.Name: LightConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Aswini, Pushya, Hasta and Abhijit are light constellations, and they can be selected for putting ornamentation, pleasures and sports, administering medicine, starting industries and undertaking travels.

Event.Name: SharpConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Moola, Jyestha, Aridra and Aslesha are sharp in nature and they are favourable for incantations, invoking spirits, for imprisonment, murders, and separation of friends.

Event.Name: MovableConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Saravana, Dhanishta, Satabhisha, Punarvasu and Swati are movable stars and they are auspicious for acquiring vehicles, for gardening and for going on procession.

Event.Name: DreadfulConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Pubba, Poorvashadha and Poorvabhadra, Bharani and Makha are dreadful stars and they are suitable for nefarious schemes, poisoning, deceit, imprisonment, setting fire and other evil deeds.

Event.Name: MixedConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Krittika and Visakha are mixed constellations and during their influences, works of day-to-day importance can be undertaken.

Event.Name: BadForStartingAllAgriculture
Event.Description: While beginning all agricultural operations, see that the 8th house is unoccupied.

Event.Name: LagnaLordIsWeekdayLord
Event.Description: Lagna owned by the planet who is lord of the weekday in question.

Event.Name: GoodLunarDayAgriculture
Event.Description: All odd lunar days except the 9th are good. All even tithis except the 2nd and 4th should be avoided.

Event.Name: BadLagnaForAllAgriculture
Event.Description: Gemini: Not favourable for any planting being a barren sign. Leo: Not good for any planting, especially bad for underground plants such as potato.

Event.Name: GoodYogaForAllAgriculture
Event.Description: Good yoga for all agriculture is formed when: 1. A good lunar day for planting 2. Lagna owned by the planet who is lord of the weekday 3. Beginning all agricultural operations, see that the 8th house is unoccupied 4. No malefic rising sign (Gemini and Leo)

Event.Name: GoodAnySeedsSowing
Event.Description: Any seeds can be sown on a day ruled by Hasta, Chitta, Swati, Makha, Pushyami, Uttara, Uttarashadha, Uttarabhadra, Rohini, Revati, Aswini, Moola or Anuradha provided the lunar day is also propitious. Choose a Lagna, owned by the planet who is lord of the weekday in question.

Event.Name: Ekadashi
Event.Description: It is the 11th tithi. Special religious significance in Hindu tradition, usually it's observed by fasting.

Event.Name: NotAuspiciousDay
Event.Description: Tuesday and Saturday should be avoided for all good and auspicious works. Tuesday is not evil after midday

Event.Name: GoodPlanetsInLagna
Event.Description: Venus, Mercury or Jupiter in the ascendant will completely destroy all other adverse influences.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFloweringPlants
Event.Description: Good for planting flowering plants when Virgo is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingGarlic
Event.Description: Good for planting garlic when Aries is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPeachAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting peach, plum, potatoes, radishes, onion sets and turnips when Taurus is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingTomatoesAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting beans, cabbage, corn, cucumber, lettuce, melons, pumpkins, tomatoes, cauliflower, water melons, and cereals when Cancer is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingGrains
Event.Description: Good for planting wheat, rye, barley, rice and other field crops when Libra is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingOnionAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting garlic and onion seeds when Scorpio is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPepperAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting Pepper and other spring crops and garlic when Sagittarius is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPotatoAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting potato, radishes and turnips when Capricorn is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingGrainsAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting all black cereals and grains when Aquarius is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPumpkinsAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting cucumbers, pumpkins, radishes, water-melons and carrots when Pisces is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingTrees
Event.Description: Good for planting trees in Rohini and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingSugarcane
Event.Description: Good for planting sugarcane in Punarvasu and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowerSeeds
Event.Description: Seeds of flower plants, and fruit-bearing creepers should be sown in the asterisms of Mriyusira, Punarvasu, Hasta, Chitta, Swati, Anuradha and Revati and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFruitTrees
Event.Description: Seedlings of long-lived fruit trees when Jupiter is in Lagna on Thursday OR Fruit trees may be planted when Sagittarius and Pisces are rising on Thursday and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowerTrees
Event.Description: Seedlings of flower trees when Venus is in Lagna on Friday and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowers
Event.Description: Seedlings of flower sown when Mars is in Lagna on Tuesday and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowerCuttings
Event.Description: Flower seeds and cuttings may be sown when Taurus or Libra rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodRullingConstellation
Event.Description: Pushya rulling is a constellation par excellence that could be universally employed for all purposes, excepting of course marriage

Event.Name: BadRullingConstellation
Event.Description:
Certain constellations, apart from their being harmonious or otherwise disposed with reference to one's own Janma Nakshatra, should be avoided for certain specific purposes on account of their inherent evil natures. In fact, Bharani is condemned for all good work and it has to be scrupulously avoided for all good work.
When a constellation like Bharani(beta Arietis) is held to be constitutionally unfit for certain types of elections; it means that the vibrations emanating from it are destructive in character
Of the several Nakshatras, Bharani and Krittika should be avoided for all auspicious works as these two are said to be presided over by the god of death (Yama) and the god of fire (Agni) respectively. In urgent cases if the Lagna could be fortified, the dosha due to nakshatra may get neutralised. The last parts of Aslesha, Jyeshta and Revati should also be avoided.

Event.Name: GoodTakingInjections
Event.Description: Injections may be taken on Saturday or Monday. Aries, Taurus. Cancer and Virgo are auspicious. The 8th house must be unoccupied. See that Mercury is free from affliction; as otherwise the pain wilt be severe and nervous weakness may set in.

Event.Name: GoodSellingForProfit
Event.Description: Selling for Profit. - Let the Moon and Mercury be free from the conjunction or aspect of Mars. The Moon's situation in Taurus. Cancer or Pisces would greatly help the seller. Try to keep Mercury in a kendra from Lagna or at least in good aspect to Jupiter. Tuesday should be avoided. Monday, Wednesday and Thursday are the best. While Friday is unpropitious, Saturday is middling.

Event.Name: BavaKarana
Event.Description: Bava is auspicious for starting works of permanent importance.

Event.Name: TaitulaKarana
Event.Description: Thaithula is propitious for marriage

Event.Name: BhadraKarana
Event.Description: Bhadra is unfit for any good work but is eminently suitable for violent and cruel deeds.

Event.Name: JanmaNakshatraRulling
Event.Description: A day ruled by one's Janma Nakshatra is ordinarily held to be unfavourable for an election. But in regard to nuptials, sacrifices, first feeding, agriculture, upanayanam, coronation, buying lands, learning the alphabet, Janma Nakshatra is favourable without exception. But it is inauspicious for war, sexual union, shaving, taking medical treatment, travel and marriage. For a woman, Janma Nakshatra would be quite favourable for marriage.

Event.Name: BadForBuyingToolsUtensilsJewellery
Event.Description:
Buying Utensils, etc. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.
Buying Jewellery. As usual unfavourable lunar days and asterisms should be avoided.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingBrassVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to the Moon while buying brass vessels. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingCopperVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to Mars when buying vessels of copper. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingSteelIronVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to Saturn if steel and iron. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingSilverVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to ascendant if of silver. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingJewellery
Event.Description: Buying Jewellery. - The Sun and the Moon should be well situated and aspected. As usual unfavourable lunar days and asterisms should be avoided.

Event.Name: GoodPlanetsIn11th
Event.Description: The mere presence of the Moon or the Sun in the 11th will act as an antidote for other evils obtaining in the horoscope.

Event.Name: GoodPlanetsInKendra
Event.Description: Jupiter or Venus in a kendra (quadrant) and malefics in 3, 6 or 11 will remove all the flaws arising on account of unfavourable weekday, constellation, lunar day and yoga.

Event.Name: Sunrise
Event.Description: It has been acknowledged that it is the moment at which the centre of the solar disc rises at the eastern horizon, that marks the sunrise at the particular place. It must also be noted that on account of the refraction of the solar rays, due to the various strata enveloping the earth, the Sun is not really at the horizon where he appears to be so but is really below the horizon by about a few minutes of arc (Rekha). But we can take the apparent time as almost correct and need not worry ourselves with the so called delicate correct time of rising.

Event.Name: Sunset
Event.Description: It has been acknowledged that it is the moment at which the centre of the solar disc rises at the western horizon, that marks the sunset at the particular place. It must also be noted that on account of the refraction of the solar rays, due to the various strata enveloping the earth, the Sun is not really at the horizon where he appears to be so but is really below the horizon by about a few minutes of arc (Rekha). But we can take the apparent time as almost correct and need not worry ourselves with the so called delicate correct time of setting.

Event.Name: Midday
Event.Description: This is marked when the centre of the Sun is exactly on the meridian of the place. The apparent noon is almost the same for all places.

Event.Name: GoodChandrabala
Event.Description: To be at its best, the Moon should not occupy in the election chart, a position that happens to represent the 6th, 8th or 12th from the persons Janma Rasi

Event.Name: BadChandrabala
Event.Description:
To be at its best, the Moon should not occupy in the election chart, a position that happens to represent the 6th, 8th or 12th from the persons Janma Rasi
Exceptions: Chandrashtama (8th) shows no evil when the Moon is waxing and occupies a benefic sign and a benefic Navamsa, or when there is Tarabala. The sting is lost when the Moon and the 8th lord are friends.

Event.Name: TarabalaJanmaStrong
Event.Description: Janma: danger to body 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaJanmaMiddling
Event.Description: Janma: danger to body 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaJanmaWeak
Event.Description: Janma: danger to body 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaSampatStrong
Event.Description: Sampat: wealth and prosperity 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaSampatMiddling
Event.Description: Sampat: wealth and prosperity 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaSampatWeak
Event.Description: Sampat: wealth and prosperity 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaVipatStrong
Event.Description:
Vipat: dangers, losses and accidents 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaVipatMiddling
Event.Description:
Vipat: dangers, losses and accidents 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaVipatWeak
Event.Description:
Vipat: dangers, losses and accidents 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaKshemaStrong
Event.Description: Kshema: prosperity 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaKshemaMiddling
Event.Description: Kshema: prosperity 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaKshemaWeak
Event.Description: Kshema: prosperity 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaPratyakStrong
Event.Description: Pratyak: obstacles 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaPratyakMiddling
Event.Description: Pratyak: obstacles 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaPratyakWeak
Event.Description: Pratyak: obstacles 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaSadhanaStrong
Event.Description: Sadhana: realisation of ambitions 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaSadhanaMiddling
Event.Description: Sadhana: realisation of ambitions 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaSadhanaWeak
Event.Description: Sadhana: realisation of ambitions 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaNaidhanaStrong
Event.Description:
Naidhana: dangers 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaNaidhanaMiddling
Event.Description:
Naidhana: dangers 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaNaidhanaWeak
Event.Description:
Naidhana: dangers 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaMitraStrong
Event.Description: Mitra: good 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaMitraMiddling
Event.Description: Mitra: good 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaMitraWeak
Event.Description: Mitra: good 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaParamaMitraStrong
Event.Description: Parama Mitra: very favourable 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaParamaMitraMiddling
Event.Description: Parama Mitra: very favourable 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaParamaMitraWeak
Event.Description: Parama Mitra: very favourable 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: Papashadvargas
Event.Description: Papashadvargs : Malefics should not be strong in shadvargas in an election chart. This event idicates that malefics are strong in shadvargas

Event.Name: GoodMoonSignForSelling
Event.Description: Selling for Profit. - The Moon's situation in Taurus. Cancer or Pisces would greatly help the seller.

Event.Name: GoodWeekdayForSelling
Event.Description: Selling for Profit. - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday are the best.

Event.Name: GocharaSummary
Event.Description: Combination of all gochara occurring at time.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When the Sun traverses through the Rasi occupied by the Moon, the person suffers from loss of wealth, loss of prestige, sickness and will have many obstacles and aimless travels. Financial loss, discomfort, chest pain and aimless journey

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When he transits in the 2nd house, there will be loss of wealth, he will suffer deceit, he will have full of financial worries. Increase of expenditure, eye trouble, deceit and unhappiness

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: In the 3rd house there will be advent of money, happiness, relief from diseases, recognition from superiors, honours and courage. Increase of emoluments, freedom from sickness and destruction of enemies

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th house, there will be diseases, constant attacks from opponents, no peace of mind, pressure from creditors, and sorrow and misery. Quarrels with wife, unhappiness in conjugal life and the general ailments

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: The Sun transiting the 5th will cause mental agitation, ill-health, embarrassment and accidents. Increase of enemies and physical indisposition

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: The Sun in the 6th gives rise to release from sorrows, worries and troubles, destruction of enemies and peace of mind. Success over enemies, joy and good health.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: The Sun transiting the 7th, produces wearisome travelling, colic and anal troubles, humiliation and sickness. Wearisome travelling, chest pain and stomach troubles.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: In the 8th, Sun's progress gives rise to quarrels with friends, diseases, high blood pressure, royal and official displeasure. Misunderstandings with or separation from wife.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: The Sun's transit in the 9th house will cause to the native danger, humiliation, dependency, disappointment and separation. Accidents, stomach trouble, mental worry and opposition.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: One will accomplish his desire and plans, and success will attend on all kinds or undertakings when the Sun is in the 10th. Success in endeavors, honour and realisation of ambition

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: In the 11th, the passage of the Sun will confer on a person honour, health, wealth and success. Great success, respect, freedom from disease and prosperity.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When the Sun passes through the 12th house, there will be sorrow, creation of a situation which causes loss to everything, quarrels and ill-health.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When the Moon transits the sign occupied by her at the time of birth of a person, the native will get excellent food, bed and clothes. Good food, comforts and clothes

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When the Moon passes through the 2nd house, loss of respect and of money and obstacles in the way of success are to be predicted. Loss of respect, money and increase of obstacles.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: In the 3rd house, the native gets clothes, pleasure from wife and finance. Domestic happiness and access to money

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th, he becomes mentally uneasy. Loss of trust in others and lack of peace of mind.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: In the 5th, suffers from humility, ill-health, pain of mind and other obstacles. Indisposition, grief and disappointment;

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th, enjoys wealth, health, comfort, redemption from enemies. Happiness, success over enemies and good health.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: 7th house, conveyances, good food and financial equilibrium. Respect from others and sudden influx of unexpected resources.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: The Moon transiting the 8th produces misery, ill-health and fear from unexpected sources. Apprehension, uneasiness and worry.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: In the 9th from herself, pain of mind, chest pain, fatigue of body and the like are caused. Mental pain, stomach trouble and incarceration.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When the Moon passes through the 10th house, success will attend in every sphere of activity. Success, authority and position, realisation of ambition.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: In the 11th house, the person will enjoy prosperity, will get wealth and new friends. Prosperity, new friends and good income

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When the Moon transits through the 12th sign. He suffers from accidents and injuries. Injuries due to fall from vehicles and increased expenditure.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Mars passes through tbe sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, be will suffer from troubles. Troubles from various sources and bodily affliction.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: In the 2nd house from the Moon displeasure of king, and suffering from quarrels, from enemies and disgrace is indicated. There will be fear from thieves and the body will be afflicted with bilious and windy complaints. Trouble from the Government, frequent quarrels with enemies, disease, accidents, bilious and windy complaints and loss by theft.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: Mars transiting the 3rd gives rise to gain of objects, pleasure from children, good health, access to riches and new clothes. Benefits through auspicious characters, financial improvement and acquisition of woolen articles and also authority.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th sign, Mars produces evil results such as fever, digestive troubles, blood discharges and depravity of character. Fever, stomachache, piles and blood discharges and frequent trouble from ailments.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: Enemies will increase, fresh diseases will make their appearance and mental peace will be completely absent when Mars passes through the 5th house. Trouble from enemies, illness, misunderstandings with children and loss of physical energy.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th house, relief from troubles, worries and ill-health should be predicted; he leads an independent life, obtains riches and becomes pretty cheerful. Success over enemies, termination of strife in the family, and acquisition of self-confidence

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When transiting the 7th, tbe native quarrels with wife or husband, eye troubles, stomach-ache, indigestion, etc., are also likely to be felt. Frequent quarrels with wife, eye trouble and stomachache.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: Mars transiting in the 8th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry. Loss of blood from piles and anemia and loss of wealth and name.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: Mars transiting in the 9th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.In addition, the subject becomes extremely weak. Suffering from insults, heavy expenditure and weakness due to ill-health.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: His transiting the 10th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve. Acquisition of money from unexpected source.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: His transiting the 11th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve. Fame, reputation and authority

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: In the 12th house, however,he will suffer from various expenses, troubles, diseases of the eye, pinpricks from an angry wife, from bilious complaints and various other worries. Unforeseen expenses, quarrels with wife, eye disease and bilious affections

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at time of birth of a person, such person will suffer loss of wealth caused by the advice of wicked men, by talebearers, by imprisonment and quarrels. He will, besides, receive disagreeable intelligence when in his journey. Loss of money due to advice by wicked men, worry due to association with tale-bearers, quarrels, imprisonment and disagreeable news while travelling

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 2nd house, the person will suffer disgrace but gains success and wealth. Disgrace, ill-treatment from relatives but acquisition of success and wealth

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When he passes through tbe 3rd house, the subject will get friends, will be afraid of troubles from the king and from his enemies, he will quit his place due to his wicked deeds. New friends, but anticipation of trouble from government and enemies, aimless roaming about due to misdeeds

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 4th house, the person's kinsmen and family will increase and there will be much gain. Prosperity for relatives and family members, addition to family and gain of money.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: In the 5th house, the person will quarrel with his wife and sons and will not enjoy the company of an excellent wife. Quarrels with wife and children.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th house,the person will be liked by all and will gain renown. Gain of renown, success and popularity.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: In the 7th house, the person's appearance becomes less bright and there will be quarrels. Bloodlessness, quarrels and mental uneasiness.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 8th house, the person will get sons, success, clothes and wealth and will become happy and powerful. Birth of an issue, success, happiness and acquisition of new articles.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When he passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will meet with obstacles in his work. Obstacles and mental worry.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: In the 10th house, the person's enemies will meet with ruin and the person will get wealth, will enjoy the company of his wife and will be dressed in the flannel. Defeat of enemies, acquisition of money, happiness with wife and agreeable company.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, comfort, sons, women, friends and conveyance and will be happy and will receive good intelligence. Acquisition of wealth; birth of a son and happiness.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: In the 12th, the person will suffer disgrace from his enemies, will suffer from diseases and will not enjoy the company of a good wife. Disgrace from enemies, disease and domestic disharmony.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, such person will lose his wealth and intelligence, will quit his place and will suffer from many quarrels. Loss of money and intelligence, aimless roaming about and frequent quarrels.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will have no enemies and will enjoy wealth and women. Happiness, domestic harmony and success over enemies.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will quit his place and will meet with obstacles in his work. Moving about from place to place, obstacles to own work and loss of position.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from troubles caused by his kinsmen, will become patient and resigned and will delight in nothing. Troubles from relatives, development of a sense of resignation to the inevitable.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will get servants, prosperity, sons, elephants, houses, bullocks, gold, women, clothes, gems and good qualities. Acquisition of servants, birth of a son, general prosperity, addition of property and development of good qualities.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be so much afflicted at heart that he will take no delight in the agreeable faces of beautiful women, in the music of the peacock and the cuckoo and in houses made pleasant by the frolic of children playing like the young of the deer. Affliction of mind, friends turning enemies and indifferent to good things.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 7th house from the Moon, the person will enjoy good bed, the company of an excellent woman, wealth, good meals, flowers, conveyance and the like and be will be of good speech and intelligence. Happiness, erotic pleasure, good income, purchase of a conveyance and graceful speech

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 8th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from imprisonment, diseases, heavy grief, the fatigue of journey and serious illness. Imprisonment, disease, heavy grief and serious illness.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will become efficient at work and influential and he will get sons, success in work, wealth and gain. Influential, birth of an issue, success in work and acquisition of wealth from an unexpected source.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 10th house from the Moon, the person will quit his place and suffer loss of health and wealth. Destruction of position, loss of money and health and aimless roaming about.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 11th house, the person will return to his country and will recover his health and wealth. Reinstatement in former position, and recovery of health.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 12th house, the person will suffer grief in his return journey. Fall from ideals and right conduct and increase of grief.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, such a person will enjoy excellent perfumes, flowers, clothes, houses, bed, meals and women. Acquisition of comforts for pleasure, and a happy life.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will get sons, wealth, grain and presents from the king; will have a prosperous family, will enjoy flowers and gems and will be of bright appearance. Acquisition of money and gifts, birth of an issue and erotic pleasure.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will become influential, wealthy and respectable and will get clothes. His enemies will meet with ruin. Influence, wealth and respect.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 4th house, the person will get friends and will become greatly powerful. Disgrace to enemies and general prosperity.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 5th house, the person will be happy, will get kinsmen, sons, wealth and friends and will not suffer defeat by the enemy. Renewal of contact with friends, increase of reputation, influence and power.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will suffer disgrace, will be afflicted with diseases and will be exposed to danger. General happiness, extension of business, birth of an issue and good income.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 7th house, the person will suffer injuries through women. Humiliation, disease and danger.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 8th house from the Moon, the person will get houses, articles of lacquer and beautiful women. Injuries and trouble from women and mental worry.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will become virtuous, happy and wealthy and he will get plenty or clothes. Acquisition of a new house, articles of luxury and wife if not married.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 10th house from the Moon, the person will suffer disgrace and will also suffer quarrels. Increase of virtue, happiness, wealth and performance of religious acts.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will get wealth of his friends and will also get perfumes and clothes. Quarrels and disgrace.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 12th house, the person will get very few clothes. Acquisition of new friends, money, perfumes and clothes.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of his birth, such person will suffer from poison and from fire, will quit his kinsmen, will suffer from imprisonment and torture, will travel to foreign lands and live with his friend there, will suffer miseries, loss of wealth and or sons, will suffer also from the fatigues of foot journey and from humiliation. Fear from poison or fire, of friends and family members, fear of incarceration, travel to foreign lands, loss of money and near relatives, separation from kith and kin and suffering from insults.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will suffer from loss of beauty and comfort, will become weak and will get wealth from other men but will not enjoy this wealth long. Emaciated physical appearance, loss of comfort, acquisition but not enjoyment of wealth

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, servants, articles of enjoyment, camels, buffaloes, elephants, asses and horses. He will become influential, happy, free from disease and will become greatly powerful and will defeat his enemies in fight. Increase of wealth and other comforts, good health, general happiness and disappearance of enemies.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his friends, wealth, and wife and ever suspecting evil in everything, will never feel happy. Separation from friends and family members, suspicious nature, crooked behaviour and wicked acts.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his sons and wealth and will suffer from quarrels. Separation from sons, loss of money and frequent quarrels.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be freed from his enemies and diseases and will enjoy the company of women. Freedom from enemies and diseases association with fair sex.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Separation from wife and children and aimless roaming about.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Indulgence in mean activities and bereft of happiness.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When he passes through the 9th house, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Besides that, suffer from hatred, chest pain, imprisonment and in consequence will not properly observe the daily duties. Indulgence in mean activities and bereft of happiness. Suffers from hatred, heart trouble and even imprisonment.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 10th house, the person will get work and will suffer loss of wealth, learning and fame. Gets new avocation, but loses money and fame.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will become cruel and will get women and wealth. Frequent loss of temper but acquisition of wealth through wrong means.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 12th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from much grief. Grief, series of miseries, ill-health and general affliction.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of his birth, such person will suffer from poison and from fire, will quit his kinsmen, will suffer from imprisonment and torture, will travel to foreign lands and live with his friend there, will suffer miseries, loss of wealth and or sons, will suffer also from the fatigues of foot journey and from humiliation.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will suffer from loss of beauty and comfort, will become weak and will get wealth from other men but will not enjoy this wealth long.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, servants, articles of enjoyment, camels, buffaloes, elephants, asses and horses. He will become influential, happy, free from disease and will become greatly powerful and will defeat his enemies in fight.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his friends, wealth, and wife and ever suspecting evil in everything, will never feel happy.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his sons and wealth and will suffer from quarrels.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be freed from his enemies and diseases and will enjoy the company of women.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When he passes through the 9th house, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Besides that, suffer from hatred, chest pain, imprisonment and in consequence will not properly observe the daily duties.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 10th house, the person will get work and will suffer loss of wealth, learning and fame.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will become cruel and will get women and wealth.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 12th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from much grief.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Ketu passes through tbe sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, be will suffer from troubles.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: In the 2nd house from the Moon displeasure of king, and suffering from quarrels, from enemies and disgrace is indicated. There will be fear from thieves and the body will be afflicted with bilious and windy complaints.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: Ketu transiting the 3rd gives rise to gain of objects, pleasure from children, good health, access to riches and new clothes.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th sign, Ketu produces evil results such as fever, digestive troubles, blood discharges and depravity of character.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: Enemies will increase, fresh diseases will make their appearance and mental peace will be completely absent when Ketu passes through the 5th house.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th house, relief from troubles, worries and ill-health should be predicted; he leads an independent life, obtains riches and becomes pretty cheerful.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When transiting the 7th, tbe native quarrels with wife or husband, eye troubles, stomach-ache, indigestion, etc., are also likely to be felt.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: Ketu transiting in the 8th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: Ketu transiting in the 9th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.In addition, the subject becomes extremely weak.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: His transiting the 10th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: His transiting the 11th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: In the 12th house, however,he will suffer from various expenses, troubles, diseases of the eye, pinpricks from an angry wife, from bilious complaints and various other worries.

Event.Name: MercuryTransit5Bindu
Event.Description: reconciliation with relation

Event.Description: anxiety through disturbed thoughts
